page.title: 09A Saturday in Lympstone
page.content: In the holidays I am usually up at 8am - the dog jumps on my bed. While I am eating my cornflakes for breakfast,I watch "T.V.am".After clearing up,I put on my tennis clothes and cycle to meet my friend.I pass the church,farm and school.At 1pm we go for lunch,my house is on the edge of Lympstone as it is new.Lunch is a snack meal as Mum often goes shopping in Exmouth.In the after- noon my friend and I may go to the shore or to my Gran's across the fields for tea.On the way home we often meet people we know as Lympstone is a very friendly place.In the evening I may help Mum with the dishes or ironing.We sometimes eat our meal watching the T.V.Mum and Dad eat at 8pm.We go to bed by 9.30. By Sarah Humphries and Susan Woodland Aged 12 years.
